# init(playbackControlDelegate:)

**Initializer**

Creates a playback coordinator for a custom playback object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(playbackControlDelegate: any AVPlaybackCoordinatorPlaybackControlDelegate)
```

## Parameters

- **playbackControlDelegate**: The playback control delegate for the playback coordinator.

## Discussion

If your app doesn’t use [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer] for playback, create an instance of this class to coordinate playback of your customer player.

## Creating a coordinator

- **AVPlaybackCoordinatorPlaybackControlDelegate**: A protocol that defines the method to implement to respond to playback commands from the playback coordinator.
